General.Name: Comfort Gloves Bhd
General.Description: Comfort Gloves Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in latex gloves in Malaysia, the United States, Asia, Europe, Canada, and internationally. It operates through Manufacturing, Investment Holding, Trading, and Others segments. The company offers natural rubber, nitrile, and specialty gloves; and provides management services. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Integrated Rubber Corporation Berhad and changed its name to Comfort Gloves Berhad in August 2015. Comfort Gloves Berhad was incorporated in 1937 and is based in Taiping, Malaysia.
